title: mac book air 820-3437  flashing blinking back light
message: Hi, I have and mac book air 820-3437 with blinking, flashing display I measure Q7707 where I found pin 5 voltage going in and out from 3.3 to.09 soi change the  backlight driver and all its resistor around it  am still getting flashing backlight I check R7789 and  R7788 and the resistance is good I replace the LCD display with another good working one still the same problem even change the LCD cable still problem remains I measure led return for 0 ohms and there good  please help thanks.

title: mac book air 820-3437  flashing blinking back light
message: If EDP_BKLT_EN is fluctuating the why mess with all the things you did? Replacing Q7707 would be the first thing in this case.

title: mac book air 820-3437  flashing blinking back light
message: Hi duke I replace Q7707 and still, the backlight is flashing on and off.

title: mac book air 820-3437  flashing blinking back light
message: Disconnect IO board cable to rule out SMC_LID is being pulled low.

title: mac book air 820-3437  flashing blinking back light
message: okay that did it io board cable making smc_lid low so now i need to replacing the cable right

title: mac book air 820-3437  flashing blinking back light
message: Yeah, common failure. Have some of them in stock, will happen again. Same for the IO boards.
